Class NoiseMapByReceiverMaker

  • java.lang.Object

      • org.noise_planet.noisemodelling.jdbc.NoiseMapByReceiverMaker

extends NoiseMapLoader
    Compute noise propagation at specified receiver points.
    Author:
    Nicolas Fortin
